revised_title: An Investigation into the Roman Foot: A Historical Overview and Analysis
tldr: This article examines the methods used to determine the measure of the Roman foot, discussing the limitations of existing foot-rules, sculptures, and other sources. The author proposes a new method of comparing the measures of ancient Roman buildings to find a common standard for the Roman foot. The article also provides a historical overview of the development of measurement standards and their impact on the accuracy of scientific discoveries.
